item.title: Israel to expand military operation and seize 'large areas' of Gaza
item.description: Defence Minister Israel Katz said this would require a large-scale evacuation of Palestinians.

item.title: Top Gun and Batman actor Val Kilmer dies aged 65
item.description: He starred in some of the biggest movies of the 1980s and 90s, also including The Doors and Heat.

item.title: Massive swells smash windows at Sydney's Bondi Beach
item.description: A powerful king tide smashed glass, cracked footpaths and caused residents to evacuate as it battered Sydney's coast line.

item.title: Myanmar quake: Imam's grief for 170 killed as they prayed in Sagaing
item.description: Scores of Muslims in the town died when their mosques collapsed during Friday prayers at the end of Ramadan.

item.title: 'I didn't feel able to come forward' - Chinese victims tell BBC about serial rapist
item.description: Police in London say PhD student Zhenhao Zou's "offending group is far greater" than they had realised.
